text: 2.2: FG 16.19-24; 17.1-9; Fi 1.30; Kor 2.1Nde kaŋgi, nza ntigar nden han zɨrga, mba tugen nza Firipai ŋgu bakɨmen ki. Nza anan kav, nza zaa bakɨme ndim, mbe nzan fhavir farfav, nza mbevav, buni mbatɨgi nza nzuai. Nza ntigem nden han zegim, gumgi mbari nza mbevim, nzan Fhe Bakɨme, ana ŋgɨrɨtɨn nza nɨɨŋgim, nza mba khesharigi farfar rɨvi fhu. Fhuvara. Nza khaŋ tɨgap thɨga havhargiap, Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nde nzuai.
